alert.note: Alert for Hardeman (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Hardeman County through 615 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chickasaw State Forest, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bolivar, Cloverport, Toone, Teague and Shandy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
